WorkItem.ClosedComment: Added 4t10Added FS changeAdded FS glyph changeAdded Shamanism changeGemming is a low priority. And if it is suggesting int gems, then you are running out of mana because you did not specify your buffs.
WorkItem.Description:
Could the developer(s) update Rawr with the latest changes for Elemental Shaman?
 
Change to Shamanism talent
Change to T10 4pc bonus
 
Without these changes being updated, it makes Rawr pretty worthless for Elemental Shaman to use.
 
Also, the gemming priority for Elemental needs a rework.  Elemental Shaman should not be gemming for Int or Mp5.  Priority should be straight Spell power > Spell power/Hit > Spell power/Haste > Spell power/Crit then Spell power/Stam only to activate Meta gems.

Comments.Message: Patch 5205 is associated with this issue, corrects T10 4P Set Bonus.
Where has this been fixed?  I use the downloaded version and as of the current version none of this has been addressed.
Where has this been fixed?  I use the downloaded version and as of the current version none of this has been addressed.
It has not been fixed as far as I can tell as the patch has not been accepted/applied yet.
